mean_cn: n. 费城（美国宾夕法尼亚州东南部港市）
mean_en: the largest city in Pennsylvania; located in the southeastern part of the state on the Delaware river; site of Independence Hall where the Declaration of Independence and the Constitution were signed; site of the University of Pennsylvania
sentence: Philadelphia is a city in Pennsylvania.
sentence_trans: 费城是宾夕法尼亚州的一座城市。
word_etyma: Phila名字 ＋ delphia阿德尔菲亚 → Philadelphia费城（美国宾夕法尼亚州东南部港市）
